{% block accounts_title %}Slivers allocation by node in the Testbed{% endblock %}

  • Current allocation of slivers to nodes in the testbed per group.
  • A treemap recursively subdivides area into rectangles; the area of any node in the tree corresponds to its value in number of slivers per node.
  • A tooltip on the mouse pointer shows details of each node (number of slivers) and the borders show the sum of nodes and slivers per group and total.
  • A click to a box opens a new browser window showing the API details for that node.
  • Select by "Count" to show all the nodes, including those with no allocated slivers.
    • A similar view per slice allocation.
